title: Beachfront land forsale in kalpitiya
details:
Beach front land for sale in Kalpitiya

30 acres
Located in tourist beach in Dutch Bay.
This area is recognized as one of the top most kite surfing and wind surfing location.

Landscape set within the oasis of mangrove forest and beautiful Sri Lankan sun set.

Land is fully private owned property with clear title over 100 years.

• three and half hours from Colombo
• two and half hours from Bandaranayeke international airport
• 10 minuets to Kalpitiya town

Nearest attractions to land -
• Dutch bay kite surfing area
• Kalpitiya dutch fort
• Kalpitiya dutch church
• Wilpattu national park

Price negotiable
Contact Lakbima Brokers for more info
